title: caffe2: Does caffe support the model running on different device (CPU and GPU) same time ?
body_html:
I want to know whether caffe2 support building the model on different device (CPU and GPU) at the same time. 
 Precisely, I want to setting part1(include some operators) of the network model running on CPU,  while part2 (others) just on GPU, just like the TF. 
 If so, how can I make it ? I used to run model by the way " workspace.RunNet(model.net)"....

body:
I want to know whether caffe2 support building the model on different device (CPU and GPU) at the same time. 
     Precisely, I want to setting part1(include some operators) of the network model running on CPU,  while part2 (others) just on GPU, just like the TF. 
     If so, how can I make it ? I used to run model by the way " workspace.RunNet(model.net)"....
